fuzzing_params.Constraints: 2 <= n, m <= 1000, edges1.length == n - 1, edges2.length == m - 1, edges1[i].length == edges2[i].length == 2, edges1[i] = [ai, bi], 0 <= ai, bi < n, edges2[i] = [ui, vi], 0 <= ui, vi < m, The input is generated such that edges1 and edges2 represent valid trees., 0 <= k <= 1000

problem_info.title: 3372. Maximize the Number of Target Nodes After Connecting Trees I
